channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 15
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 15

item.title: CVE-2022-45449|2024-07-16T16:22:53.735Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to excessive privileges assigned to Acronis Agent. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows, Linux) before build 30984.
